title: Oil Prices Rise as the U.S. Escalates Its Tanker Crackdown Off Venezuela

title: Trump's 'Gold Card' relies on legal loophole to help wealthy foreigners get U.S. visa
summary: In exchange for $1 million and a $15,000 processing fee, "Gold Card" applicants will get full-time residency in the U.S., the program's website says.
